# cameraLensSmudgeDetectionInterval

**Instance Property**

The camera lens smudge detection interval.

## Declaration

```swift
var cameraLensSmudgeDetectionInterval: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/cameraLensSmudgeDetectionInterval] is set by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/setCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled(_:detectionInterval:)]. By default, this property returns `kCMTimeInvalid`.

## Configuring lens smudge detection

- **isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled**: Whether camera lens smudge detection is enabled.
- **setCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled(_:detectionInterval:)**: Specify whether to enable camera lens smudge detection, and the interval time between each run of detections.
- **cameraLensSmudgeDetectionStatus**: A value specifying the status of camera lens smudge detection.
- **AVCaptureCameraLensSmudgeDetectionStatus**: Constants indicating the current camera lens smudge detection status.
